content:
Hello all,

Is there a way to make the tests run a subset of (new) tests first, instead of waiting for the whole thing to run?
Also, is there some way to disable tidy while doing checks. I don't intend to actually commit this, so it's more annoying than anything
The error I was getting was the "too many issues in ui/issues", so I just deleted a bunch to make the others work, but that's ultra-janky. If anyone knows of a fix, please let me know.
An addendum for those who didn't see the first post: I'm not committing the version with 100 missing tests. :sweat_smile:
